features: Stuff your decorative throw pillow cover or euro sham pillow cover and add a little flair to your sofa couch or bed
Down like comfort, our fluffy pillow form provides extra cushion support for neck and lumbar whether you are reclining in bed or lounging on couch, soft yet firm
Elegantly sewed with high thread count smooth polyester fabric and generously filled with quality polyester fiber, durable and allergy-free
16 x 26 inches, rectangle, recommended with pillowcase one size (2") smaller than pillow filler for an over-stuffed look
Put pillow stuffer into dryer on medium heat for 15 minutes to reach to maximum fluffiness - Machine washable
body.description: Filled with premium polyester microfiber and lined with 400 thread count quality polyester fabric cover trimmed elegantly, plump and fluffy with a high loft, offering exceptional support and comfort. Our thick and supportive decorative throw pillow inserts pop up quickly, fitting wonderfully into the pillow cases and sham covers. All materials are pure and clean, offering allergy-free comforts for your loved ones. Compressed for shipping. Machine washable in gentle cycle, tumble dry low.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Support, Soft, Comfort and Lighter Hypoallergenic construction repels dust and allergens Contributes to better, more restful sleep Set of 4 pillows inserts, 6 sizes to choose For a fuller rounded pillow, order one size larger Pillowcovers should be washed once a month. Acanva Pillow Inserts A Pillow You Deserve Acanva is a developing manufacturer of throw pillow insert brands in the world. We focus on the design, production and sale of interior decoration, providing consumers with gorgeous and comfortable interior decorations, allowing us to enjoy the wonderful feeling of being surrounded by a plumper pillow on the sofa after a long day's work. Easy To Care Machine washable in gentle cycle, tumble dry low. We suggest you replace your pillow every three years.

Acanva is dedicated to help customers improve the quality of daily life. At Acanva, we provide a wide variety size of pillows for our customers. You can choose a pillow that fits your sleeping height according to your habits. For decoration, we recommend three to five per sofa, depending on the size of the furniture and how pillowed up you’d like it to look.

100% Hypoallergenic Polyester The breathability and smoothness are the most desirable for the skin，you will feel very comfortable. Fluffy, Comfort and Elegance Ample firm support for your neck as you lie in bed or back support for when you're in a seated position. Guide to Insert Your New Pillow Four steps like the picture shows. Please lightly bat pillow against knee to spread filling evenly after insert.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality filler
reviews.reviewText: This pillow is perfect in both shape and size. It is firm enough to hold its shape, yet very comfy. Great fit for decorative pillow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Search Is Over!
reviews.reviewText: Let me start off by saying that I have at least thirty throw pillow covers. They are all very high end and come from all over the world. I am super picky about the pillow forms / inserts that I use. For at least nine years now, I have been searching for that 'perfect' pillow insert. I never found it, so I had basically given up. I was presented with an opportunity to review the Acanva Hypo-Allergenic Pillow Form, so I thought, 'Why not?' Since most of my pillow cushions are 18" x 18", I ordered a 20" x 20" form. **This is VERY important: ALWAYS get the next size UP pillow form from your pillow cover. You cannot attain and keep the proper fullness unless you go up in size.**My Acanva form arrived very quickly. It was shipped on the 5th and arrived on the 8th. My pillow form was wrapped in a very heavy plastic seal that had been compressed. This was a very good sign to me as it showed that Acanva is concerned over the hypo-allergenic claim. With the form being compressed and sealed, it keeps out allergens, moisture, dust, dander, etc... It is very disconcerting to walk into a arts and crafts store and see pillow forms loosely packaged, open, and with a thin piece of cellophane over it. So to see that Acanva had packaged their forms sealed and compressed let me know immediately that they take pride in their products. When I opened the seal, the pillow form immediately fully opened...nice and plump.What impressed me next was the cover. I have NEVER seen a pillow form covered like this one. The cover is VERY thick (absolutely no show through) and is EXTREMELY soft. The cover is reminiscent of a set of heavy 800 thread count Egyptian sheets that I have. If you have ever bought pillow forms (other than Acanva) before, you'll know that they have a very thin, tearable mesh-like material. This gives no protection and might only last through one washing...might.Lastly, I inserted this form into my pillow cover and it was pure bliss! My beautiful cover had never looked so nice. It's plump and full, but soft and pliable. I even laid on it awhile and it plumped right back to the original size. My search for the perfect pillow form is over! I'm so glad I decided to review this as I will definitely be buying more and replacing all of my old inserts.I so hope this review helps others out there that are looking for a great quality, very reasonably priced pillow form. I did receive this pillow form at a discount in exchange for an honest review. However, I absolutely pride myself in making honest reviews that will actually benefit customers. I would absolutely never recommend something that I wouldn't buy myself at full cost. Please check my review history to see proof of this. Thank you for reading!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very high quality pillow
reviews.reviewText: Just what I need it, it is two inches longer and wider than my pillow case and it fits perfectly! Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars ... have so many throw pillow covers it isn't even funny. I have been looking for new inserts for ...
reviews.reviewText: I have so many throw pillow covers it isn't even funny. I have been looking for new inserts for them recently after a move since I got rid of the older now lumpy ones and came across this hypo allergenic one. We have pet allergies and low and behold we also have pets so this sounded perfect! This arrived completely flat and I was really concerned that it would not fluff up but upon taking it out of the package it fluffed extremely well. I've had it for a few days and it's probably about 5 inches thick now (a huge difference than the about half inch it was packaged up) It had no plastic odor (you know what I'm talking about) but the only reason I am not giving it 5 stars is that it does not seem to fully fill out my throw pillow covers even though the measurements add up. I will be buying either some filling to add or a second pillow for each cover. It is extremely comfortable for a throw pillow though. Excellent choice, Just wish it was a little fluffier.I received this product at a discount or free in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Purchased for an after Christmas bed set I got for next year. Pillow shams were suppose to be filled, were not, so I purchased these. They were super nice, filled out the whole sham, even corners. Make sure to buy bigger size to take care of those corners and make pillow plumper. Good price, would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars What a mixed bag, um... cushion.
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this to go with some really awesome hippie cushion coverings. You can probably see them in the recommendations below.This one was may be a good fit for others, but not me. In my opinion, the cushion is way too soft for me. My bottom sinks RIGHT to the floor with all the cushioning pushing out around the legs. Some of it stays around your butt, YOU ARE still going to feel that floor under you.There is a slight level of comfort to this as it does pad the area around you and will help warm you up in winter, but I have ordered a similar cushion from another brand here on amazon that actually keeps my bottom at least 6" off the floor, provides support, and feels like a giant padded seat rather than a pillow you're sinking into. Which is AWESOME!!!So sorry to the company for the lower review as it wasn't really for me, but for any 9f you out there like a butt-sinks-instantly-to-the-floor style cushion, this is for you!Move on or enjoy. Whichever lol.
C’est correct aurait pu être plus rembourré.
Compre esta almohada para un cojín 18"x11" le quedo genial. Es super cómoda!!! La recomiendo.

reviews.reviewTitle: Le titre de l’article décrit est à changer
reviews.reviewText: Je n’ai reçu qu’un seul coussin, alors qu’il est écrit lot de 4 coussins. On se moque du client. Passez votre chemin.
La calidad de los cojines es buena, vienen empacados al vacío y son suaves. Pero dice que son de 26” y en realidad son de 20”.Por lo que no me sirven de nada
Cushions are Too Soft and expensive. They hardly fit into the casing and do not expand firm enough to sit on
